item.title: 警惕全球紧张局势，津巴布韦将利率维持在 35
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡表示，津巴布韦担心全球紧张局势加剧，决定将银行政策利率维持在 35% 不变。【原文：Zimbabwe, wary of a rise in global tensions, resolved to leave its bank policy rate unchanged at 35%, according to John Mushayavanhu, the central bank governor.】

item.title: 根据参议院法案，富裕大学将面临较低的税收增长
item.description: 周一，参议院共和党人的税收法案公布，对捐赠基金征收的税率将低于众议院共和党议员所支持的税率。【原文：Wealthy US colleges scored a win on Monday with the release of Senate Republicans’ tax bill, which would institute a lower tax hike on endowments than what GOP House members have backed.】

item.title: 肯-格里芬谈特朗普、哈佛大学以及新手投资者为何无法战胜专业投资者
item.description:
价值 660 亿美元的对冲基金 Citadel 的创始人正在迈阿密这个新 "南方华尔街 "的核心地区兴风作浪。【原文：

The founder of $66 billion hedge fund Citadel is making waves in Miami, the nucleus of the new “Wall Street South.”

】

item.title: 千禧年股权出售谈判让对冲基金估值 140 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，伊兹-英格兰德（Izzy Englander）的千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）一直在商讨出售该对冲基金巨头的少数股权，其估值约为 140 亿美元。【原文：Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management has been in discussions to sell a minority stake that values the hedge fund colossus at roughly $14 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Cantor 表示，随着金融用途的增加，索拉纳投资者可能会受益
item.description: Cantor Fitzgerald 公司的分析师表示，寻求投资加密货币 Solana 的公司可能会从金融行业使用该加密货币的增加中获益。【原文：Companies looking to invest in the cryptocurrency Solana may benefit from increased use of the coin in the financial industry, according to analysts at Cantor Fitzgerald.】

item.title: 斯塔默和特朗普将同意实施削减关税协议
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）周一将与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）达成一致，执行上个月宣布的贸易协议，削减美国对英国主要出口产品的关税，并提高英国对某些美国农产品的配额。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer is set to agree Monday with President Donald Trump to implement a trade deal announced last month to slash US tariffs on key British exports and raise UK quotas on certain American agricultural products, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 法律风险缓解，埃利奥特联营公司考虑对 Citgo 发起新竞购
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，艾略特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家关联公司正在考虑重新加入竞购 Citgo Petroleum Corp.【原文：An Elliott Investment Management affiliate is considering rejoining the bidding for Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 参议院在盐税问题上陷入僵局，法案草案显示目前的上限为 10,000 美元
item.description: 参议院版本的唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统税收法案要求对州和地方税收减免设置 10,000 美元的上限；这只是一个暂定数字，因为共和党人对这一宝贵的税收减免仍存在分歧。【原文：The Senate’s version of President Donald Trump’s tax bill calls for a $10,000 cap on the state and local tax deduction — a placeholder figure as Republicans remain divided over the valuable tax break.】

item.title: 投资者密切关注冲突，中东地区首次公开募股仍按计划进行
item.description: 以色列和伊朗之间的冲突不断升级，给中东的股票资本市场注入了新的不确定性，使今年迄今为止一直表现坚挺的中东地区面临考验。【原文：The escalating conflict between Israel and Iran is injecting fresh uncertainty into the Middle East’s equity capital markets, putting what has been a resilient region so far this year to the test.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）在批评声浪中转而使用优先股购买比特币
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的 "战略 "公司在过去七天里买入了 10.5 亿美元的比特币，这是这家加密货币库公司连续第三周完全使用优先股而不是普通股来为购买提供资金。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy bought $1.05 billion in Bitcoin in the last seven days, the third consecutive week in which the cryptocurrency treasury company has used preferred shares exclusively instead of common stock to fund purchases.】

item.title: 无销售额的草药股大涨 64,000
item.description: 今年迄今为止，这只专注于草药的生物技术股已经飙升了超过 64000%，但公司本身的收入却为零，更不用说实现盈利了。【原文：A biotech stock focused on herbal medicine has surged by more than 64,000% so far this year and yet, the company itself has made zero revenue — much less turned a profit.】

item.title: 前壳牌美国石油贸易老板声称被拖欠 2,900 万美元奖金
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）在美国的前石油交易主管在诉讼中声称，他的 2020 年奖金被拖欠了 2900 多万美元，这起诉讼揭示了这家石油巨头利润丰厚的交易部门内部的补偿问题。【原文：Shell Plc’s former head of oil trading in the US was stiffed on his 2020 bonus by more than $29 million, he claims in a lawsuit that shines a light on compensation inside the oil major’s lucrative trading unit.】

item.title: Scale AI 的 Wang 带来了其他人正在做什么的元知识
item.description: Scale AI 联合创始人亚历山大-王（Alexandr Wang）热衷于网络，以至于他的前室友、OpenAI 首席执行官萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）曾开玩笑地告诉他，要稍微收敛一点。【原文：Scale AI co-founder Alexandr Wang is such an enthusiastic networker that his former roommate — OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman — once jokingly told him to tone it down a bit.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 评论：更大、更好
item.description:
第二代 Switch 带来了设计改进和更快的性能，但电池续航时间和游戏选择却令人失望。【原文：

The second-generation Switch brings design improvements and faster performance, but the battery life and game selection underwhelm.

】

item.title: BC Partners 投资的电信公司 United Group 任命 KPN 毕业生为首席执行官
item.description: BC Partners 旗下的东南欧电信运营商 United Group 任命前 Royal KPN NV 高管 Stan Miller 为首席执行官。【原文：United Group, the southeastern European telecom operator owned by BC Partners, appointed former Royal KPN NV executive Stan Miller as chief executive officer.】

item.title: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）的酋长队被密苏里州的体育场融资提议所吸引
item.description: 美国国家橄榄球联盟堪萨斯城酋长队（NFL Kansas City Chiefs）的归属之争愈演愈烈，密苏里州的立法者们采取了一项重大举措，以阻止球队跨越州界。【原文：The battle over where the NFL’s Kansas City Chiefs will end up is intensifying, with Missouri lawmakers taking a major step to keep the team from crossing state lines.】

item.title: Gamma 提供意大利博彩公司 Lottomatica 21% 的股份
item.description: Lottomatica Group Spa 的最大股东 Gamma Intermediate 正在寻求出售其在这家意大利博彩公司的全部股份，价值约为 12 亿欧元（14 亿美元）。【原文：Lottomatica Group Spa’s largest shareholder Gamma Intermediate is seeking to sell its entire stake in the Italian betting company, worth about €1.2 billion ($1.4 billion).】

item.title: 陷入困境的美国商品期货交易委员会首任主席威廉-巴格利（William T. Bagley）逝世，享年 96 岁
item.description: 威廉-巴格利（William T. Bagley）去世，他是加利福尼亚州的资深议员，曾移居华盛顿，作为商品期货交易委员会的创始主席主持了该委员会混乱的最初几年。享年 96 岁。【原文：William T. Bagley, a veteran California legislator who moved to Washington to preside over the chaotic first years of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission as its founding chairman, has died. He was 96.】

item.title: 面对中国限制，七国集团努力确保关键矿产安全
item.description: 从手机到风力涡轮机，七大主要经济体正努力加强关键矿物的供应，以摆脱对中国材料的依赖。【原文：The Group of Seven leading economies are working to shore up supplies of critical minerals as they seek to move away from reliance on China for materials used in everything from mobile phones to wind turbines.】

item.title: 油价飙升引发页岩钻探商套期保值潮
item.description: 上周在中东发生的最初导弹袭击刺激了石油期货的飙升，引发了生产商寻求锁定较高价格的套期保值浪潮，使一些交易商彻夜不眠。【原文：The surge in oil futures spurred by the initial missile attacks in the Middle East last week triggered a wave of hedging by producers seeking to lock in the higher prices, keeping some traders up late into the night.】

item.title: 在行业分水岭时刻，主动型 ETF 的数量已超过被动型基金
item.description: ETF 市场迎来了一个具有象征意义的转折点：主动型基金的数量首次超过了被动型基金，这标志着该行业与追踪指数的起源大相径庭；尽管主动型管理资产仍只占资产的十分之一。【原文：The ETF market has hit a symbolic turning point: active funds now outnumber passive ones for the first time, marking a sharp break from the industry’s index-tracking origins — even if actively managed assets still account for just a tenth of assets.】

item.title: 美国银行称外国对国债的需求出现 "裂痕
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，各国央行自 3 月份以来一直在抛售国债，这表明它们正在分散美元资产。【原文：Central banks have been selling Treasuries since March, suggesting that they are diversifying away from dollar assets, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 爱尔兰政府将退出 AIB，将银行收归私人所有
item.description: 爱尔兰国家启动了与 AIB Group Plc 的最后一次股份出售，将其在该贷款机构的股份降至零，并将其转为私人所有。【原文：The Irish state has launched its final share sale with AIB Group Plc, reducing its stake in the lender to zero and putting it into private ownership.】

item.title: 七国集团开幕之际，特朗普称与加拿大的贸易协议 "可以实现
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在七国集团峰会期间对解决与加拿大的贸易争端表示乐观，称美国与其北方邻国在未来几周内达成协议是 "可以实现的"。【原文：President Donald Trump expressed optimism about settling a trade dispute with Canada during his time at the Group of Seven summit, calling a deal in the coming weeks between the US and its northern neighbor “achievable.”】

item.title: 尼日利亚汽油零售商警告丹格特炼油厂的垄断行为
item.description: 尼日利亚的汽油零售商指责非洲首富阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）试图通过其大型炼油厂垄断西非国家的石油产品销售。【原文：Gasoline retailers in Nigeria accused Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest person, of seeking to monopolize the sales of petroleum products in the West African nation with his mega refinery.】

item.title: 牛肉加工商 Kilcoy 提交美国首次公开募股申请，利润不断增长
item.description: Kilcoy Global Foods Ltd. 周一早些时候提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请，以利用美国和亚洲消费者对预制蛋白质食品快速增长的需求。【原文：Kilcoy Global Foods Ltd. filed early Monday for an initial public offering in the US, to capitalize on the fast-growing appetites of both US and Asian consumers for prepared protein-based foods.】

item.title: Hacksaw 持有者在斯德哥尔摩首次公开募股中寻求高达 3.55 亿美元的资金
item.description: 在线博彩游戏开发商和发行商 Hacksaw 的股东计划在斯德哥尔摩进行首次公开募股，募集高达 33.5 亿瑞典克朗（约合 3.55 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Shareholders in Hacksaw, a developer and distributor of online betting games, plan to raise as much as 3.35 billion Swedish kronor ($355 million) in an initial public offering in Stockholm.】

item.title: 达成债务重组协议，Solo Brands 股价飙升
item.description: Solo Brands Inc. 达成了一项债务重组协议，首席执行官约翰-拉森（John Larson）临时接任，因为这家户外休闲公司多年来一直在无利可图的困境中挣扎。【原文：Solo Brands Inc. reached a debt-restructuring deal and took the interim tag of Chief Executive Officer John Larson as the outdoor-leisure firm has struggled with years of unprofitability.】

item.title: 尼日利亚年度通货膨胀率连续第二个月放缓
item.description: 尼日利亚的年度通货膨胀率连续第二个月下降，使政策制定者对价格趋势有了更清晰的认识，而在此之前，1 月份的一次数据调整给前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation rate cooled for a second straight month, giving policymakers a clearer picture of price trends after a data revamp in January clouded the outlook.】

item.title: 住房并非人人昂贵
item.description:
您是否拥有 ZIRP 时代的抵押贷款？【原文：

Do you have a ZIRP-era mortgage or not?
